arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
وَ آوِنِيْ فِيْهِ بِرَحْمَتِكَ إِلَى دَارِ القَرَارِ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah: on this day, (please] lead me so that I will correspond with the upright ones;
And keep me away on this day from the company of the evils;
And lodge me on this day, on account of Your mercy, to the Abode of Perpetual Settlement;
Out of Your godhead; O the God of the worlds.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
wa āwinī fīhi biraḥmatika ilā dāril qarār
